My humble words are not sufficient to praise them.

source_sentence: 萬曆癸巳歲孟秋望日檇李心一居士朱衷純謹識
translation: This is a consciousness from Zhu Jicun, a monk of the Xingyi school in Idaho, on the first day of the moon in the year of the Wanli period.
